title: #311: Jesus Did This
description:
Timestamps below!

Jesus went to a gas station this week to get Ryan’s ex to Vicki’s house to remind RHONJ’s Joe Giudice that he wasn’t resurrected on Christmas. Also, Mike has some shoe dramz on Shahs. Have fun!

Timestamps:
0 Crappens Mailbag
24:15 RHOC
1:13:30 RHONJ
1:49:20 Shahs of Sunset

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
